comment: Ultima VII: The Black Gate - Spell Data

spells.name: Awaken All
spells.desc: This spell awakens all unconscious members of the mage's party.

spells.name: Create Food
spells.desc: This spell creates enough food for the mage and each member in his party to have one meal.

spells.name: Cure
spells.desc: This spell cures poison and restores a person afflicted with paralysis. It has also been known to work against an assortment of other malicious maladies.

spells.name: Detect Trap
spells.desc: This spell reveals the location of all traps within sight of the mage and his party.

spells.name: Great Douse
spells.desc: This spell is a more potent version of the Linear spell Douse. It extinguishes all dousable items within a certain area.

spells.name: Great Ignite
spells.desc: This spell is a more potent version of the Linear spell Ignite. It will cause all flammable items within a certain area to burst into flame.

spells.name: Light
spells.desc: This spell is a more potent version of the Linear spell Glimmer. It creates a source of light that will illuminate a darkened area. This light source can travel with the party and lasts for a significant amount of time.

spells.name: Locate
spells.desc: This spell reveals the sextant position of the mage, even when underground.

spells.name: Awaken
spells.desc: This spell awakens one unconscious member of the mage's party.

spells.name: Destroy Trap
spells.desc: This spell destroys any one specific trap upon which it is cast.

spells.name: Enchant
spells.desc: This spell causes up to an entire bundle of arrows or bolts to become enchanted and glow blue. Enchanted missiles will always hit their target and do significantly more damage than normal.

spells.name: Fire Blast
spells.desc: This spell causes great jets of flame to burst forth from the mage and strike his target.

spells.name: Great Light
spells.desc: This spell is a more potent version of the First Circle spell Light, and has a substantially longer duration.

spells.name: Mass Cure
spells.desc: This spel l cures the mage and all members of his party at once.

spells.name: Protection
spells.desc: This spell temporarily makes its subject more difficult to strike in combat, as well as rendering him invulnerable to traps and other hazards.

spells.name: Telekinesis
spells.desc: This spell allows the mage to manipulate objects without touching them.

spells.name: Curse
spells.desc: This spell is a minor curse that temporarily makes an enemy easier to hit in combat, while making it harder for him to strike the mage or any member of his party.

spells.name: Fireworks
spells.desc: Decorative fireworks spell.

spells.name: Heal
spells.desc: This spell heals half the injuries that its subject has sustained.

spells.name: Magic Lock
spells.desc: This spell magically locks doors and containers.

spells.name: Paralyze
spells.desc: This spell paralyzes an enemy in his tracks for a short period of time.

spells.name: Peer
spells.desc: This spell gives the Mage a look at the entire world as well as showing his location in it.

spells.name: Poison
spells.desc: This spell enables a mage to poison one enemy.

spells.name: Teleport
spells.desc: This spell teleports the mage and his party to a targeted location.

spells.name: Dispel Field
spells.desc: This spell can dispel any type of magical field, such as a Fire Field.

spells.name: Explosion
spells.desc: This spell creates a ball of flame that rushes toward the mage's intended target and explodes.

spells.name: Great Heal
spells.desc: This spell completely heals an injured person.

spells.name: Magic Unlock
spells.desc: This spell unlocks magically locked items, including doors and chests.

spells.name: Mass Protection
spells.desc: This spell is the equivalent of casting the Third Circle spell Protection on everyone in the mage's party simultaneously.

spells.name: Poison Field
spells.desc: This spell creates a field of energy that will poison all who come into contact with it.

spells.name: Sleep
spells.desc: This spell causes the enchanted person to fall asleep.

spells.name: Unlock Magic
spells.desc: This spell unlocks magically locked items.

spells.name: Charm
spells.desc: This spell can be used either to ensorcell an enemy or creature into doing the mage's bidding, or to free one who is under the effects of a charm.

spells.name: Clone
spells.desc: This spell creates an exact duplicate of any mortal creature, who will then fight on the same side as the original.

spells.name: Energy Field
spells.desc: This spell creates an electrical field that protects the mage by harming all who attempt to pass through it.

spells.name: Fear
spells.desc: This spell causes such a wave of fear that each man and creature who is not in the mage's party might flee as if in danger of death.

spells.name: Fire Field
spells.desc: This spell creates a wall of fire between the mage and his enemies.

spells.name: Mass Curse
spells.desc: This spell is similar to the Third Circle spell Curse, but it affects an entire group of the mage's enemies.

spells.name: Mass Sleep
spells.desc: This spell is a more potent version of the Second Circle spell Sleep. It puts to sleep a group of targets that are not in the mage's party.

spells.name: Poison Cloud
spells.desc: This spell creates a poisonous cloud that damages enemies.

spells.name: Chain Bolt
spells.desc: This spell creates a bolt of lightning that chains between multiple enemies.

spells.name: Dispel Magic
spells.desc: This spell dispels magical effects.

spells.name: Energy Bolt
spells.desc: This spell projects a bolt of magical energy at the target.

spells.name: Explosion Field
spells.desc: This spell creates a field that explodes when enemies enter it.

spells.name: Invisibility
spells.desc: This spell renders the mage undetectable, not only from sight but to all means of normal detection. There are certain creatures that, for various reasons, are capable of seeing invisible objects or people.

spells.name: Mass Invisibility
spells.desc: This spell is the equivalent of casting the Fifth Circle spell Invisibility upon the mage and everyone in his party.

spells.name: Reveal
spells.desc: This spell makes visible all things that were invisible within a specific area.

spells.name: Summon
spells.desc: This spell summons a powerful creature that will fight for the mage and his party.

spells.name: Create Gold
spells.desc: This spell changes a chunk of lead into ten gold nuggets.

spells.name: Death Vortex
spells.desc: This spell creates a swirling black vortex at the point the mage designates, which will thereafter move at random. Everyone within this vortex will be continuously struck by lightning.

spells.name: Energy Mist
spells.desc: This spell causes an electrified mist that flows from the caster, enveloping his enemies and harming them as long as they remain within it.

spells.name: Mass Charm
spells.desc: This spell is similar to the Fifth Circle spell Charm, but it affects an entire group of the mage's enemies.

spells.name: Mass Might
spells.desc: This spell doubles the strength and combat abilities of everyone in the mage's party.

spells.name: Might
spells.desc: This spell doubles the strength and combat abilities of one party member.

spells.name: Restoration
spells.desc: This spell instantly heals all injury, dispels all harmful magic and cures all poison or paralysis inflicting the mage and his party.

spells.name: Swordstrike
spells.desc: This spell creates a deadly pinwheel of eight spinning swords that sails toward the designated target.

spells.name: Create Ice
spells.desc: This spell creates ice from thin air.

spells.name: Death Bolt
spells.desc: This spell enables the mage to project a bolt of lethal energy at a specified target.

spells.name: Earthquake
spells.desc: This spell creates violent tremors in the earth.

spells.name: Fetch
spells.desc: This spell summons a distant object to the mage's hand.

spells.name: Flame Strike
spells.desc: This spell creates a field of fire at the feet of all the mage's enemies that are within sight.

spells.name: Mass Death
spells.desc: This spell causes everyone in sight (except of the mage and his party) to instantly drop dead.

spells.name: Resurrect
spells.desc: This spell, when successful, empowers the mage to restore life in one who has died.

spells.name: Time Stop
spells.desc: This spell stops the passage of time for the entire world, with the exception of the mage and his party.
